Sir Roger Gale

Roger Gale MP
The House of Commons

Hello and welcome.
Here you can find many of my recent press releases and newspaper articles, together with more personal details including my biography, details of groups I support and associated photographs.
I have represented North Thanet since 1983 and I have always regarded it as my first priority to promote the interests of this constituency.
I should like to emphasise that although I am proud to sit in the House of Commons as a supporter of the Conservative Party, I try to represent all my constituents, regardless of party politics.
Please do not hesitate to get in touch with me if you need my help with a problem or have a query you would like to discuss - at any time. Just write to me at the address above (if the House is not sitting - at weekends and during recess periods - then my mail is forwarded to Kent within hours).
Alternatively, you may wish to come along and see me at one of my regular constituency Advice Surgeries. In that event please contact me via the link at the top of this page.
My wife, Suzy, who is my Parliamentary Office Director and my staff will be delighted to give you full details of my surgeries and to arrange an appointment for us to meet in either Herne Bay or in the Margate area.
Yours sincerely,
With all good wishes from Suzy and myself.
(Promoted by Roger Gale MP of The Old Forge, 215A Canterbury Road, Birchington CT7 9AH)
